name: Lucky Bastard
description:
Multiple storylines
-over 5 hours of gameplay
-12 girls waiting for you

MC of the game is a businessman, luck smiles on him, he gets exclusive rights to supply goods to a closed international market. To realize this project the protagonist needs an investor. The game starts before the MC meets the investor. There are many female characters in the game with whom the MC can interact sexually. Some girls are ready to give themselves to the MC, others will have to be achieved, sometimes using blackmail and their dependence on the MC. The player is given the opportunity to control the MC's assistant, for whom he has no love interest.
